LanguageData.ChateauAvalon.label: chateau Avalon
LanguageData.ChateauAvalon.description: Over 90% ammonia with trace impurities, including alcohols - the most popular alcohol drink among Avali. \nConsumption by non-Avali may cause chemical damage of different severity, blindness, brain damage, death.
LanguageData.ChateauAvalon.tools.1.label: neck
